application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details pursuant to ref: 24/01106/FUL: construction management plan (3), landscaping (5), sustainable drainage strategy (6), energy statement (8) and internal consumption of portable water (11), for the sub-division of site and erection of end of terrace 2-storey dwelling house, with vehicular access, associated hardstanding and cycling  refuse storage.

constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: LHA Maximum Height Level: All buildings, structures, and works exceeding 150 metres in height (492.1 feet).
LLA Maximum height level: All buildings, structures, and works exceeding 150 metres in height (492.1 feet)
RIVBUF River Buffer: Bounds Green BrookCode: RIVBUF1
DMDAAP Designation: Area Action Plan- Area: North Circular Road- Policy: Core policy 44
DMDNCA Designation: North Circular Road Opportunity Site

decision_conditions: The information provided in respect of discharging construction management plan (3), and Sustainable drainage strategy (6) are considered insufficient and inadequate, thereby considered unacceptable and contrary to the Core Strategy (2010), the Development Management Document (2014), Policies of the London Plan (2021) and the NPPF (2024). As discharge of conditions cannot be part discharged, this also means condition 5, 8, and 11 have also not been discharged.
